#summary How to build/install library and applications.

= Building =

Before making executables from sources, You have to download firmwares archive, that avaliable from here: [http://tipok.org.ua/downloads/hardware/crusher264/firmware/firmware.tar.gz firmware.tar.gz]

{{{
$ tar -xvzf  crusher264-1.1.1.tar.gz
$ cd crusher264-1.1.1
$ wget http://tipok.org.ua/downloads/hardware/crusher264/firmware/firmware.tar.gz
$ tar -xvzf firmware.tar.gz
$ ./configure
$ make
}}}

= Installing =

{{{
$ sudo make install
}}}
